alert.note: Alert for Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:00PM CDT until June 18 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SUNFLOWER AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tribbett, or 8 miles southwest of Indianola, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tribbett around 310 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
